sense.name: a large urban center, a metropolis
sense.examples: Thousands were killed when the city was bombed. Mary has always lived in big cities. The city seemed indifferent to the young immigrant's plight. The city looked beautiful at night across the water. We got lost in the city and had to ask directions.

sense.name: an administrative district
sense.examples: The residents were angry at the city for closing two elementary schools. Three cities in our state have adopted a ban on using cell phones while driving. The city decided to raise taxes to fund the new tunnel project.

sense.name: a defining or quintessential quality
sense.examples: That movie was basically shoot-out city. It's going to be fat city for us!
